h5.li: We request you to kindly fill this form as soon as possible for further processing of your child's admission request.
Please note that in case you don't have clear scanned copies of the documents requested,
you can leave those unfilled in the form below and visit the school with the documents requested.
We will be happy to collect it and update all required details in our system for further processing.
However, submitting those online will expedite your childs admission confirmation.
